parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Perhaps from a and the base of meros; properly, to miss the mark, i.e. to err, especially to sin.
Without law, lawlessly. Adverb from anomos; lawlessly, i.e. not amenable to law.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.
Without law, lawlessly. Adverb from anomos; lawlessly, i.e. not amenable to law.

In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.
